item.title: Government AI copyright plan suffers fourth House of Lords defeat - BBC
item.description:
1. Government AI copyright plan suffers fourth House of Lords defeat  BBC
  2. Starmer rejects fresh attempt to protect artists against AI  The Telegraph
  3. Nick Clegg says asking artists for use permission would ‘kill’ the AI industry  The Verge
